caption.text: Whether to add a caption to the video.

callback_id.text: A custom ID for callback purposes.

meta.description: This API now generates videos with our New AI Studio backend.

voice_id.text: The ID of the voice that the avatar will use.

input_text.text: The text that the avatar will speak in the video.

input_audio.text: input audio url. Specify either input_text/voice_id or input_audio.

avatar_pose_id.text: The ID of the avatar's pose. You can specify this field from the response of avatar.list API

meta.description: Generates a transparent WEBM video of a customizable avatar speaking input text.

age.text: Type your avatar age like Young Adult , Early Middle Age , Late Middle Age , Senior , Unspecified.

pose.text: Type your avatar pose like half_body , close_up , full_body

style.text: type your avatar style like Realistic , Pixar , Cinematic , Vintage , Noir , Cyberpunk , Unspecified.

gender.text: Type your avatar gender like Man,Woman,Unspecified

ethnicity.text: Type your avatar ethnicity like White , Black , Asian American , East Asian , South East Asian , South Asian , Middle Eastern , Pecific , Hispanic , Unspecified.

appearance.text: Description/Prompt of the generated avatar photo, maximum 1000 characters

orientation.text: Type your avatar orientation like square , horizontal , vertical.

meta.description: Generates photos for avatars and returns a generation ID for checking status and retrieving the final images.

dimension.text: (Optional) Sets the output video dimensions, maintaining the template's aspect ratio.

folder_id.text: enable users to specify video folder destination

include_gif.text: include a GIF preview download URL in the webhook response, Defaults to false

enable_sharing.text: make the sharing page of this video public upon creation, Defaults to false

meta.description: This API now supports New AI Studio!
List Supported Languages

video_url.text: The URL of the video file to be translated. Supports direct video file URLs, Google Drive URLs, and YouTube URLs.

callback_id.text: A custom ID for callback purposes.

callback_url.text: (Optional) A dynamic callback URL for each video; webhooks are recommended for more customization.

brand_voice_id.text: A Brand Voice that gets incorporated to the translation.

output_language.text: The target language in which the video will be translated.

translate_audio_only.text: Translate only the audio, ignore the faces and only translate the voice track in this video. default: false

enable_dynamic_duration.text: Enables dynamic duration to adjust video timing for smoother conversations and better translation.

meta.description: Translate Video

avatar_id.text: ID of the Interactive Avatar you would like to use with the Streaming API

knowledge_base.text: Knowledge Base prompt used for chat task type.

disable_idle_timeout.text: By default session has a 2 minute idle timeout, setting to true disables it

meta.description: This endpoint is used to initiate a new streaming session.

sdp.text: The Session Description Protocol (SDP) data used to establish the connection.

sdp.sdp.text: The SDP string containing the connection information.

session_id.text: The ID of the session that you want to start.

meta.description: This endpoint is used to start the connection for an existing streaming session.

task_mode.text: Whether the task is performed synchronously or not (available values: sync and async; default is sync)

session_id.text: The ID of the session to which the task is to be sent.

meta.description: This endpoint is used to send a text to an Interactive Avatar, prompting it to speak the provided text.

session_id.text: The ID of the session to be stopped.

meta.description: This endpoint is used to terminate an active streaming session.
This endpoint is used to interrupt the speaking of an Interactive Avatar.
Creates a photo avatar group using a generated or uploaded image; supports one photo for identity, with more added via the add looks API.

heygen__v2__photo_avatar__avatar_group__.text: Add looks to photo avatar group

group_id.text: avatar group id to add looks into

image_keys.text: A list of images you want to add to the avatar group, maximum 4 at a time

generation_id.text: Generation id what is used to generate the image_keys, it must be passed in if the image is generated, if it's an upload image, then this is optional

meta.description: Add other looks to existing photo avatar group

orientation.text: Type your avatar orientation like square , horizontal , vertical.

meta.description: This endpoint can be used to generate additional looks for a trained photo avatar group. The photo avatar group must be trained to use this endpoint.

url.text: The URL where you will receive events from HeyGen.

events.text: The events that your URL is set to receive. None means all events. You can see supported events at /v1/webhook/webhook.list.

entity_id.text: Optional. The specific entity ID associated with the webhook. eg. video_id,project_id

name.text: Name of the folder , Defaults to test
